Name: Monopolist: Technological Revolution
About the game: Imagine being a monopolist of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. In the game Monopolist: Technological revolution - wins the one who will earn the first 50000$ or eliminate other players from the game, forcing them to go bankrupt. AI - artificial intelligence. • Merchant is a cautious player whose purpose is to lead a trade while avoiding losses. He will not buy an enterprise if he has not enough money to keep his business. • The buyer is a pretty dangerous player. He buys everything that can and may change your plans to create a monopoly. • The monopolist is the most dangerous type of player. He carefully buys the firms that will bring him the most profits and willingly creates a monopoly. Set up startup capital and choose the color of your car and go ahead of monopolizing the city. Addition: • Get some images that you can use as avatars. Images are in the game's directory.
